subject: Triathlon
Running
Bicycles and Bicycling
Athletics and Sports
Trademarks and Trade Names
lead_paragraph: Like pro beach volleyball and off-season tennis exhibitions, triathlons draw only modest crowds of spectators. But at the participatory level, the sport is booming.
snippet: Like pro beach volleyball and off-season tennis exhibitions, triathlons draw only modest crowds of spectators. But at the participatory level, the sport is booming.
